text:
Is there any simple way to pair a HubDB table field selection and a resulting HubDB row selection based on the table selected previously? I would like to have a module that fulfills a general need for many tables in my database, so I would like to generalize it as much as I can. I have an example below where I attempt to display what I'm looking to do with this module. Otherwise I can fall-back to JS. Thanks.

```[
  {
    "id": "table",
    "name": "table",
    "label": "HubDB Table",
    "required": false,
    "locked": false,
    "inline_help_text": "",
    "help_text": "",
    "type": "hubdbtable",
    "placeholder": "",
    "default": null
  },
  {
    "name": "row",
    "label": "HubDB Row",
    "required": false,
    "locked": false,
    "table_name_or_id": "{{ selected table value goes here! }}",
    "type": "hubdbrow",
    "default": null
  }
]```
